title: Remove extra homepage banners and eliminate all 'AI' references from generated media usage

requirements.summary: Remove Banner #4–#6 from the homepage banner carousel list so only 3 banners remain and the carousel continues to function correctly.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/config/siteMedia.ts` has exactly 3 entries in `siteMedia.banners` (the previous entries #4–#6 are removed).
The homepage banner carousel shows only 3 banners and continues to autoplay/navigate correctly.
No console errors occur due to banner list length changes.

file_operations.description: Update `siteMedia.banners` to contain exactly 3 items by removing the previous 4th–6th entries, leaving only the three banner images used by the slider.

requirements.summary: Remove all case-insensitive occurrences of the word "AI" from user-facing text and ensure no UI-referenced image paths/metadata include "ai" (including banners, galleries, SEO OG/Twitter images, and alt text templates).
acceptanceCriteria: No user-facing UI text contains the word "AI".
No image `src` paths referenced by the UI contain "ai" (e.g., `/assets/generated/ai-...` must be replaced with non-"ai" filenames).
No `alt` text generated by components (banner, grid, lightbox, gallery) contains the word "AI".
Open Graph/Twitter image paths used by SEO do not contain "ai".

file_operations.description: Remove/replace all `/assets/generated/ai-...` references from banners and every category gallery list so no UI image `src` includes "ai".
Audit and ensure the banner image `alt` template contains no "AI" wording and remains appropriate after reducing the banner list to 3 items.
Audit and ensure gallery/grid image `alt` templates and any user-facing copy contain no "AI" wording while keeping routing and page structure unchanged.
Audit and ensure lightbox image `alt` text contains no "AI" wording.
Audit SEO meta generation to confirm Open Graph/Twitter image paths used by the app do not contain "ai" and remain correct.
Audit homepage user-facing text and SEO `ogImage` usage to ensure "AI" is not mentioned and no referenced asset paths contain "ai".

requirements.summary: Replace currently referenced generated images for the 3 homepage banners and the Birthday, Anniversary, Welcome Baby, and Car Boot Decor galleries with new photo-style static images (non-"ai" filenames) and update `siteMedia.ts` so galleries still have multiple images each.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/config/siteMedia.ts` no longer references any `/assets/generated/ai-banner-*.png` or `/assets/generated/ai-gallery-*.png` paths.
The Birthday, Anniversary, Welcome Baby, and Car Boot Decor category gallery pages render with multiple images and do not show the empty-state message under normal navigation.
The homepage banner carousel renders using the new non-"ai" banner filenames.
All newly-added generated image files are stored as static assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and are referenced via `/assets/generated/...` paths.

file_operations.description: Add the new generated banner image asset at `frontend/public/assets/generated/banner-1.dim_1600x900.png`.
Add the new generated banner image asset at `frontend/public/assets/generated/banner-2.dim_1600x900.png`.
Add the new generated banner image asset at `frontend/public/assets/generated/banner-3.dim_1600x900.png`.
Add the new generated gallery image asset at `frontend/public/assets/generated/gallery-birthday-1.dim_1200x1200.png`.
Add the new generated gallery image asset at `frontend/public/assets/generated/gallery-anniversary-1.dim_1200x1200.png`.
Add the new generated gallery image asset at `frontend/public/assets/generated/gallery-welcome-baby-1.dim_1200x1200.png`.

Add the new generated gallery image asset at `frontend/public/assets/generated/gallery-home-decor-1.dim_1200x1200.png`, and reference it within an existing gallery list in `frontend/src/config/siteMedia.ts` (without adding new categories/routes).
Add the new generated gallery image asset at `frontend/public/assets/generated/gallery-car-decor-1.dim_1200x1200.png`.

Replace the three banner entries with `/assets/generated/banner-1.dim_1600x900.png`, `/assets/generated/banner-2.dim_1600x900.png`, `/assets/generated/banner-3.dim_1600x900.png`. Replace the generated image entries for Birthday/Anniversary/Welcome Baby/Car Boot Decor galleries with the new non-"ai" gallery files (e.g., `/assets/generated/gallery-birthday-1.dim_1200x1200.png`, `/assets/generated/gallery-anniversary-1.dim_1200x1200.png`, `/assets/generated/gallery-welcome-baby-1.dim_1200x1200.png`, `/assets/generated/gallery-car-decor-1.dim_1200x1200.png`) while ensuring each of those galleries still contains multiple images. Also remove/replace any remaining `ai-gallery-*` usage from other categories to comply with REQ-22.
Remove the old generated asset `frontend/public/assets/generated/ai-banner-1.dim_1600x900.png` to prevent any future UI references that include "ai".
Remove the old generated asset `frontend/public/assets/generated/ai-banner-2.dim_1600x900.png` to prevent any future UI references that include "ai".
Remove the old generated asset `frontend/public/assets/generated/ai-banner-3.dim_1600x900.png` to prevent any future UI references that include "ai".
Remove the old generated asset `frontend/public/assets/generated/ai-gallery-1.dim_1200x1200.png` to prevent any future UI references that include "ai".
Remove the old generated asset `frontend/public/assets/generated/ai-gallery-2.dim_1200x1200.png` to prevent any future UI references that include "ai".
Remove the old generated asset `frontend/public/assets/generated/ai-gallery-3.dim_1200x1200.png` to prevent any future UI references that include "ai".
